author: Ali Miller Richards
text:
The U.S. Supreme Court ruled unanimously that a public safety officer's Constitutional right to privacy was not violated when the police chief reviewed text messages sent on the employer-provided communications device.
SCOTUS Wiki article: http://www.scotuswiki.com/index.php?title=City_of_Ontario_v._Quon

title: Update on Ontario v. Quon--What Do You Think?
